post_title: 1909 T206 Young (Bare hand). Listening to offers.
post_content:
1909 T206 Young (Bare hand)-has a top left corner crease and a and a diagonal line in the cap that goes over the "C" inside the cap. It is diagonally up to the right of Young's ear.

Price is $1600.00.

S/h is $5.00 unless you live in California, Oregon or the state of Washington in which cases the s/h is $5.50.

If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].

Listening to offers.
